data.event: Gainesville man gets 15 years for killing baby.
Tony Servance Jr., 20, the boyfriend of the Markel Barton’s mother, pleaded no contest to second-degree murder for Markel’s death in November 2007.
Acting Circuit Judge Mary Day Coker sentenced Servance to 15 years in prison to be followed by 24 months of probation and also ordered him to attend anger management classes.

event.title: 24 months of probation and also ordered
